sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERVIUS, Maurus Honoratus, a celebrated grammarian and critic of antiquity, who flourished about the time of Arcadius and Honorius. He is now chiefly known by his Commentaries on Virgil. There is also extant a piece of Servius upon the feet of verses and the quantity of syllables, called Centimetrum.
